author: Staff Reporter
text: The Indian National League (INL) is keen to ally with AIADMK for the upcoming Assembly election, according to its State president M. Basheer Ahmed. “The cadres of INL would give their heart and soul to consolidate the minorities’ votes in favour of the AIADMK,” he said here on Sunday. Claiming that seat-sharing talks were on with the AIADMK, he said his party had sought 9 constituencies.
title: INL for alliance with AIADMK
